messages.subject: carol's day
messages.msgSnippet: carol from wi, not only was it fun to have a glimpse of your day with 7children, but also i was impressed with your mental track of the day. meaning, i think
messages.messageBody:
carol from wi, not only was it fun to have a glimpse of your day with
7children, but also i was impressed with your mental track of the day.
meaning, i think if i went to write it down, i wouldnt have near the grasp of
what time it was (even approx) when who was doing anything. it is probably a
personality thing, i lose track of time pretty easily and get immersed in
what i am doing... and it may be a gift of yours that is a blessing bc you
are constantly tracking so many people. thank you so much for taking the
time to type and sharing with us!
erin
ps i was relieved to hear of the follow-up crashing on the couch bit. thnx
for that, too!
